snippet.title: Code Romantic 2020 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Prettysmart games presents Code Romantic! A visual novel that teaches Computer Science concepts and C# programming skills set in a post-apocalyptic war against sentient machines. Players follow the story of Mina Lovelace as she joins the ReProgrammer Academy, prepares for battle, and falls in love along the way.

🤖💞  Fall in love. Save the world. Learn to code.

PLAY CODE ROMANTIC NOW! 🔽
On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/884980/Code_Romantic/
On itch.io: https://prettysmart.itch.io/code-romantic

Learn more at https://coderomantic.com

💖 Become a Patron and support our indie game studio! 
💖 https://www.patreon.com/prettysmartgames 

#prettysmartgames #CodeRomantic #coding
